overview: Business negotiations can be tricky, but true professionals know how to get right down to business and hammer out a deal.  It's important for a boss to know what his employees are doing at all times and to reprimand them when necessary.  A firm handshake tells you a lot about a man, but these guys are eager to learn a lot more than just that.  Working late can be hazardous to any relationship. Lucky for this employee, he has some good company with him.  Everyone wants to get ahead of the game, but this employee sure knows how to get himself in the right place at the right time.
title: Office Twinks 3
